results.description: Real Madrid and Barcelona battle for the title on the final day of La Liga on Sunday, while Juventus can be crowned champions of Italy.
results.shortTitle: Five-year wait over for Real Madrid?
results.title: Real Madrid on brink of La Liga title while Juventus can clinch Serie A

thumbnail.altText: Real Madrid boss Zinedine Zidane (left) and Barcelona boss Luis Enrique

results.description: Paris St-Germain kept their slim title hopes alive as they thrashed Bastia but remain three points behind Monaco after their win at Nancy.
results.title: Paris Saint Germain 5-0 Bastia

results.description: Bastia forfeit their game with Lyon and are made to play two matches behind closed doors after violence caused the match to be abandoned.
results.shortTitle: Bastia forfeit Lyon game after violence
results.title: Bastia forfeit game after Lyon violence & must play two games behind closed doors

thumbnail.altText: Bastia fans invade the pitch against Lyon

results.description: Bastia's Ligue 1 match against Lyon is abandoned after home fans invade the pitch at the match in Corsica.
results.title: Bastia v Lyon abandoned amid crowd trouble as fans try to attack players

results.description: French side Bastia have been ordered to close part of their stadium after Nice striker Mario Balotelli was racially abused.
results.title: Mario Balotelli: Bastia punished after fans racially abuse Nice striker

results.description: Monaco move four points clear at the top of Ligue 1 after coming from behind to earn a point against Bastia.
results.title: Bastia 1-1 Monaco

results.description: A supporter who racially abused Mario Balotelli is given a stadium ban by Ligue 1 side Bastia.
results.shortTitle: Fan who abused Balotelli given stadium ban
results.title: Mario Balotelli: Fan who racially abused striker given stadium ban by Bastia

results.description: Nice move back to the top of Ligue 1 - although their lead is now only one point - after drawing the Mediterranean derby with Bastia.
results.title: Nice 1-1 Bastia
